title: Economic picture ‘different’ to when Labour made £28bn green pledge – Reeves
description: Shadow chancellor Rachel Reeves said the economic picture is “very different” to when Labour set out its green investment plan as she refused to repeat her party’s £28 billion spending commitment. title: Nottingham attacks: Police face probe over killer's alleged assaults
description: A police force that was investigating alleged assaults by a triple killer weeks before the Nottingham attacks has referred itself to its watchdog. Barnaby Webber and Grace O'Malley-Kumar, both 19, were fatally stabbed on 13 June along with Ian Coates, 65. Valdo Calocane was given a hospital order for the killings on Thursday.
